content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Oil Extraction System at (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) - now has small electric pole at (19.5,40.5) but still lacks power
- Storage tank at (22.5, 40.5) - appears to have been removed (error in step 30)
- Pipe network connecting pumpjack (positions: (19.5,38.5), (18.5,38.5), (21.5,38.5), (20.5,38.5))

### Operational Power Plant at (-8.5, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (-8.5, 20.0) - now operational with 49 coal and connected water system
- Offshore pump at (-11.5, 21.5) - actively supplying water
- Pipe network (positions: (-6.5,21.5), (-6.5,20.5), (-11.5,22.5), (-8.5,22.5), (-7.5,22.5), (-6.5,22.5))

### Secondary Boiler at (27.5, 41.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (27.5, 41.0) - still non-functional (missing fuel and water input)

### Coal Mining Operation at (16.0, 21.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (16.0, 21.0) - extracting coal
- Wooden chest at (16.5, 23.5) - coal storage
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 22.5) - transfers coal from drill to chest

## ERROR TIPS

### Variable reference errors (new)
- Steam engine variable undefined (occurred 2 times) - ensure variables are properly initialized before use
- Storage tank reference failed (occurred 2 times) - verify entity existence before operations

### Power system issues (updated)
- Pumpjack still not receiving power despite pole placement - complete power plant first
- Steam engine placement failed due to terrain issues - verify placement area is clear and on land
- Direct coal insertion to pumpjack failed (occurred 4 times) - pumpjacks require electricity, not fuel

### Entity management (recurring)
- Storage tank missing at (22.5,40.5) - verify critical infrastructure remains intact
- Failed to get entities at specified positions - always check entity existence before operations

### Construction patterns (recurring)
- Complete power plant before attempting to power other systems
- Verify all system components exist before connection attempts
- For fluid systems, ensure all connections are properly established

### General tips (updated)
- When debugging, check entity status messages carefully ("not receiving electricity", "no fluid present")
- For complex systems, build and test components sequentially
- Maintain backup of critical infrastructure positions
- Verify power requirements for each machine type (electric vs fuel-powered)
